name: ScriptureBox
0:
”Alexa, tell Scripture Box to review today's verses.”
”Alexa, ask Scripture Box to review my verses.”
skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: scripture box
Developer Terms of Use
des: Scripture Box is a rotational scripture memory service that automates your rotation to present each day's verses for quick and easy review. Review online, from email or with Alexa!
